# David Thyresson - Personal Website and Blog

> David Thyresson, General Partner at Preston-Werner Ventures

## About

This is the personal website and blog of A. David Thyresson.

David is a Managing Director and General Partner at PWV (Preston-Werner Ventures) where he invests in early stage technology startups alongside Tom Preston-Werner and David Price.

## Key URLs

- Home: /
- Blog: /blog
- RSS Feed: /rss.xml
- Music: /music
- Feeds: /feeds

## Topics

This site covers:
- Venture capital and startup investing
- Technology (RedwoodJS, Supabase, web development)
- Education and AI in education
- Music (concerts attended, music technology, drum machines, synthesizers)
- Personal essays and poetry
- Recipes
- Academic papers (Joyce, Middlebury coursework)

## Technology Stack

Built with:
- Astro framework
- TailwindCSS
- Astro DB (Turso)
- Netlify

- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/dthyresson/
